Posts.Content: Hi laura, I think you should ask for weekly Paclitaxel instead of the docetaxol. I found the Paclitaxel much easier than the Fec. Although it can affect your fingertips and toes. And it's a bit of a pain going in weekly. It's certainly worth asking about...
Posts.Title: Mum starts Docetaxel soon for stage 3 breast cancer. Any advice ladies...
